ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They desired to trap him but We made them the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They wished to entrap him, but We made them greater losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They had sought to do evil to him, but We caused them to be the worst losers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They had devised an evil plan (against Abraham), but We turned it into failure."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they wished to cause him harm, so We made them the greatest of losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they wanted to harm him, but We made them the worst losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they desired a war on him, but We made them the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They desired to outwit him; so We made them the worse losers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they wished to set a snare for him, but We made them the greater losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They had sought to do him harm, but We frustrated them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they intended to do him an evil, but We made them the worst losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They plotted to harm him, but We made them the biggest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then they sought a stratagem against him: but We made them the ones that lost most!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they wanted to harm him, but We made them the worst losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They sought to outwit him, but We made them the worst of losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They planned to harm him, but We made them the worst losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:70] And they sought to outwit him, namely, by having him burnt, but We made them the greater losers, in what they sought.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they wished to set a snare for him) i.e. to burn him, (but We made them the greater losers) the ones who were humbled. 357
